Work

Development

Rally + Next.js
A self-motivated workout webapp. Users can upload a photo of themselves to be used with their own words of encouragement to help them reach their weekly workout goal.

Crab Bot (discord.js)
Discord bot with slash commands (ex. /get-tasks) and implementing different APIs (Trello, Youtube, weather).
